leaf_cluster.leaf_cluster_name: 化学信息-分子表示与检索生态
leaf_cluster.tool_form: 表示库 + 向量检索 + index

queries: [WEB] graph neural network molecule featurizer github

tools.name: Jupyter Dock
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive molecular docking and visualization workflows in Jupyter
tools.detailed_description: A set of Jupyter Notebooks designed for performing molecular docking protocols interactively, including visualization, file format conversion, and result analysis.

tools.name: ChemicalX
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning library for drug-drug interaction and pair scoring
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch and TorchDrug based deep learning library designed for drug pair scoring tasks, such as predicting drug-drug interactions, polypharmacy side effects, and combination synergy.

tools.name: DeepMol
tools.one_line_profile: Machine and deep learning framework for computational chemistry
tools.detailed_description: A standardized framework for applying machine learning and deep learning techniques to computational chemistry problems, facilitating drug discovery pipelines.

tools.name: PCMol
tools.one_line_profile: Protein-conditioned de novo molecular generator
tools.detailed_description: A multi-target de novo molecular generator that conditions generation on AlphaFold's latent protein embeddings to design molecules for specific protein targets.

tools.name: ChemDataExtractor
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for extracting chemical information from scientific literature
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for automatically extracting chemical information from scientific documents, including named entity recognition and relationship extraction for chemical properties.

tools.name: SMILES Transformer
tools.one_line_profile: Pre-trained Transformer for molecular fingerprinting from SMILES
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of a Transformer-based model pre-trained on SMILES strings to generate molecular fingerprints, useful for low-data drug discovery tasks.

tools.name: u-signal3D
tools.one_line_profile: Platform for 3D molecular organization analysis on cell surfaces
tools.detailed_description: A computational platform that defines shape-invariant representations of spatial scales of molecular organization at the cell surface, enabling comparison and machine-learning of signaling across diverse cell populations.

tools.name: TorchDrug
tools.one_line_profile: Machine learning platform for drug discovery
tools.detailed_description: A powerful and flexible machine learning platform designed for drug discovery, covering graph machine learning, protein representation learning, and molecule generation.

tools.name: rdkit-scripts
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of utility scripts for RDKit
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Python scripts and helper functions to facilitate common chemoinformatics tasks using the RDKit library.

tools.name: rdeditor
tools.one_line_profile: Simple RDKit-based molecule editor GUI
tools.detailed_description: A graphical user interface for editing molecular structures, built using RDKit and PySide.

tools.name: scikit-mol
tools.one_line_profile: Scikit-learn compatible molecular vectorization
tools.detailed_description: A library providing scikit-learn compatible transformer classes for molecular vectorization and fingerprinting using RDKit.

tools.name: MatDeepLearn
tools.one_line_profile: Graph neural network library for materials chemistry
tools.detailed_description: A library designed for applying graph neural networks to materials chemistry tasks, such as property prediction.

tools.name: KerasNeuralFingerprint
tools.one_line_profile: Keras implementation of neural graph fingerprints
tools.detailed_description: A Keras-based implementation of neural fingerprints that operates on molecular graphs of arbitrary size.

tools.name: neural-fingerprint
tools.one_line_profile: Convolutional networks for molecular fingerprints
tools.detailed_description: The original implementation of convolutional networks on graphs for learning molecular fingerprints, capable of handling molecular graphs of arbitrary size.

tools.name: SELFormer
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular representation learning via SELFIES language models
tools.detailed_description: A Transformer-based model for molecular representation learning that utilizes SELFIES strings to generate embeddings for downstream tasks.

tools.name: InformaticsMatters Pipelines
tools.one_line_profile: Containerised components and workflows for cheminformatics and computational chemistry
tools.detailed_description: A collection of containerised tools and Nextflow pipelines for various cheminformatics tasks, facilitating reproducible computational chemistry workflows.

tools.name: MaSIF
tools.one_line_profile: Geometric deep learning framework for molecular surface interaction fingerprints
tools.detailed_description: MaSIF (Molecular Surface Interaction Fingerprints) uses geometric deep learning to decipher patterns in molecular surfaces, enabling prediction of protein-protein interactions and other surface-based properties.

tools.name: EAGCN
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-View Spectral Graph Convolution with Consistent Edge Attention for Molecular Modeling
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of EAGCN, a deep learning model for molecular property prediction that utilizes multi-view spectral graph convolutions and edge attention mechanisms.

tools.name: psikit
tools.one_line_profile: Python interface bridging Psi4 and RDKit for computational chemistry
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that integrates Psi4 (quantum chemistry) and RDKit (cheminformatics), allowing users to run quantum mechanical calculations on molecules processed via RDKit.

tools.name: chemper
tools.one_line_profile: Chemical Perception Sampling Tools
tools.detailed_description: A tool for automatically creating SMARTS patterns for chemical perception, useful for force field parameterization and chemical substructure identification.

tools.name: SMILES-RNN
tools.one_line_profile: RNN-based model for de novo molecule generation
tools.detailed_description: A repository implementing SMILES-based Recurrent Neural Networks (RNNs) for reinforcement learning-based de novo molecule generation.

tools.name: nfp
tools.one_line_profile: Keras layers for graph neural networks in chemistry and materials science
tools.detailed_description: A library providing Keras layers for end-to-end learning with RDKit and Pymatgen, facilitating the construction of Graph Neural Networks for molecular and crystal property prediction.

tools.name: ccdutils
tools.one_line_profile: Tools for handling PDBe Chemical Component Dictionary definitions
tools.detailed_description: A set of Python tools to parse and manipulate PDB chemical component definitions for small molecules, utilizing RDKit for chemical processing.

tools.name: Free-Wilson
tools.one_line_profile: Implementation of Free-Wilson SAR analysis method
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of the Free-Wilson method for Structure-Activity Relationship (SAR) analysis using RDKit, allowing for the decomposition of biological activity into substituent contributions.

tools.name: rd_filters
tools.one_line_profile: Structural alert filtering tool for drug discovery
tools.detailed_description: A script and library to screen molecules against structural alerts (e.g., PAINS, Glaxo, BMS) using RDKit and ChEMBL protocols, essential for filtering undesirable compounds in drug discovery.

tools.name: solubility
tools.one_line_profile: Implementation of ESOL solubility prediction method
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of Delaney's ESOL (Estimated SOLubility) method using RDKit for predicting aqueous solubility of organic molecules.

tools.name: useful_rdkit_utils
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of utility functions for RDKit
tools.detailed_description: A curated collection of helper functions and utilities for RDKit, addressing common tasks in cheminformatics such as visualization, tagging, and property calculation.

tools.name: RadonPy
tools.one_line_profile: Automated physical property calculation library for polymer informatics
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed to automate physical property calculations for polymers, integrating MD simulations and other computational methods for polymer informatics.

tools.name: CIDER
tools.one_line_profile: Chemical dataset comparator and visualizer using RDKit
tools.detailed_description: A Python package and Jupyter workflow for comparing chemical structure datasets (SD files) based on size, overlap, descriptor distributions, and chemical space clustering.

tools.name: Cheminformatics Microservice
tools.one_line_profile: API-based microservices for essential cheminformatics operations
tools.detailed_description: A set of microservices designed to be accessed via API calls to support various cheminformatics tasks, facilitating integration into larger systems.

tools.name: iFeatureOmega-CLI
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive CLI platform for molecular feature extraction
tools.detailed_description: A command-line interface for generating, analyzing, and visualizing over 170 representations for biological sequences, 3D structures, and ligands.

tools.name: iFeatureOmega-GUI
tools.one_line_profile: GUI platform for molecular feature extraction and analysis
tools.detailed_description: A graphical user interface version of iFeatureOmega for generating and analyzing molecular representations, designed for users with limited programming expertise.

tools.name: ScaffoldGraph
tools.one_line_profile: Library for scaffold network and tree generation
tools.detailed_description: An open-source cheminformatics library built on RDKit and NetworkX for generating and analyzing scaffold networks and scaffold trees to explore chemical space.

tools.name: molgraph
tools.one_line_profile: Graph neural networks for molecular machine learning in TensorFlow
tools.detailed_description: A Python package implementing graph neural networks for molecular machine learning, compatible with TensorFlow and Keras APIs.

tools.name: moldrug
tools.one_line_profile: Genetic algorithm for drug-oriented molecule optimization
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for drug-oriented optimization in chemical space, utilizing genetic algorithms to evolve molecular structures.

tools.name: rdkit_ipynb_tools
tools.one_line_profile: RDKit utilities for Jupyter Notebooks
tools.detailed_description: A collection of tools and helpers to enhance the usage of RDKit within IPython/Jupyter Notebooks, focusing on visualization and data handling.

tools.name: DGL-LifeSci
tools.one_line_profile: Deep Graph Library for Life Sciences
tools.detailed_description: A python package for applying graph neural networks to chemistry and biology tasks, built on top of the Deep Graph Library (DGL).

tools.name: MolPipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Scikit-learn compatible molecular processing pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A Python package that wraps RDKit functionality into scikit-learn compatible transformers, enabling the construction of molecular machine learning pipelines.

tools.name: MolRep
tools.one_line_profile: Deep representation learning library for molecular property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive library for molecular representation learning, providing various state-of-the-art models for property prediction tasks.

tools.name: descriptastorus
tools.one_line_profile: Descriptor computation and storage for machine learning
tools.detailed_description: A library for efficient computation and storage of molecular descriptors, designed to support machine learning workflows in chemistry.

tools.name: mols2grid
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive 2D molecule viewer for dataframes
tools.detailed_description: A tool to generate interactive grids of 2D molecular structures from pandas DataFrames or RDKit molecules, facilitating data exploration.

tools.name: QCF
tools.one_line_profile: Quantum Computing Functions for Octave/Matlab
tools.detailed_description: A toolbox for simulating quantum computing algorithms (like Grover and Deutsch) based on Nielsen & Chuang's formalism.

tools.name: chembience
tools.one_line_profile: Docker-based platform for cheminformatics web apps
tools.detailed_description: A platform facilitating the development and deployment of cheminformatics-centric web applications and microservices using Docker.

tools.name: ChEMBL Beaker
tools.one_line_profile: RDKit functionality exposed as a web service
tools.detailed_description: A wrapper around RDKit that exposes its functionality via a REST API, allowing chemical processing over the web.

tools.name: ProLIF
tools.one_line_profile: Protein-Ligand Interaction Fingerprints generator
tools.detailed_description: A library to generate interaction fingerprints for protein-ligand complexes from molecular dynamics trajectories or docking poses.

tools.name: Chemprop
tools.one_line_profile: Message Passing Neural Networks for property prediction
tools.detailed_description: A robust library for training Message Passing Neural Networks (MPNNs) for molecular property prediction, widely used as a baseline in cheminformatics.

tools.name: PromptSMILES
tools.one_line_profile: Chemical language models for scaffold decoration and linking
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for scaffold decoration and fragment linking using chemical language models and reinforcement learning.

tools.name: rdchiral
tools.one_line_profile: Stereochemistry-aware reaction handling wrapper for RDKit
tools.detailed_description: A wrapper for RDKit's reaction handling functionality that improves the treatment of stereochemistry during reaction template application.

tools.name: ePMV
tools.one_line_profile: Embedded Python Molecular Viewer for 3D animation software
tools.detailed_description: A plugin that runs molecular modeling software directly inside professional 3D animation applications (like Blender, Maya) for high-quality visualization.

tools.name: molsetrep
tools.one_line_profile: Library for molecular set representation learning
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed for learning representations of sets of molecules, enabling machine learning tasks where the input is a collection of molecules rather than a single entity.

tools.name: datamol
tools.one_line_profile: High-level molecular processing library built on RDKit
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that provides a simplified and ergonomic API for molecular processing and manipulation, built on top of RDKit to streamline cheminformatics workflows.

tools.name: molfeat-padel
tools.one_line_profile: PaDEL descriptors plugin for the molfeat library
tools.detailed_description: A plugin for the molfeat ecosystem that enables the calculation of PaDEL molecular descriptors, integrating Java-based PaDEL functionality into Python workflows.

tools.name: DeepChem
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive deep learning library for life sciences
tools.detailed_description: A robust Python library that democratizes deep learning for science, providing tools for drug discovery, materials science, quantum chemistry, and biology, including implementations of MolNet and various featurizers.

tools.name: DeepChem GUI
tools.one_line_profile: Web-based graphical user interface for DeepChem
tools.detailed_description: A web interface designed to make DeepChem's functionalities accessible via a GUI, facilitating model training and prediction for users without extensive coding experience.

tools.name: ChemBERTa-3
tools.one_line_profile: Pre-trained transformer models for molecular representation
tools.detailed_description: A repository containing the ChemBERTa-3 models, which are BERT-like transformers pre-trained on large chemical datasets for generating molecular embeddings and fine-tuning on downstream tasks.

tools.name: DeepMD-kit
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning package for molecular dynamics and potential energy surfaces
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning package designed for generating many-body potential energy representations and running molecular dynamics simulations with ab initio accuracy.

tools.name: ECFPinvert
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for inverting ECFP fingerprints to molecular structures
tools.detailed_description: An algorithmic tool that attempts to reconstruct molecular structures from their Extended Connectivity Fingerprints (ECFP), useful for interpretability and inverse design.

tools.name: rdkit-scripts
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of cheminformatics utility scripts using RDKit
tools.detailed_description: A curated collection of command-line scripts and utilities for common cheminformatics tasks such as conformation generation, docking preparation, and molecular property calculation, built on RDKit.

tools.name: chemistry_drawer
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive molecular visualization tool using Plotly
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool that leverages Plotly to create interactive 2D drawings of chemical molecules, enhancing visualization capabilities for cheminformatics data.

tools.name: padelpy
tools.one_line_profile: Python wrapper for PaDEL-Descriptor software
tools.detailed_description: A Python wrapper that provides an interface to the Java-based PaDEL-Descriptor software, allowing users to calculate molecular descriptors and fingerprints directly within Python scripts.

tools.name: FFiNet
tools.one_line_profile: Force field-inspired molecular representation learning model
tools.detailed_description: A molecular representation learning model that incorporates physical insights from force fields to improve the quality of learned molecular embeddings.

tools.name: Graph_convolutional_NN_molecule_maker
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Neural Network for molecular generation
tools.detailed_description: A Graph Neural Network implementation designed for the generative design of molecules, utilizing geometric machine learning principles.

tools.name: neural_fingerprints_tf
tools.one_line_profile: TensorFlow implementation of Neural Graph Fingerprints
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of Convolutional Networks on Graphs for Learning Molecular Fingerprints (Neural Fingerprints) using TensorFlow, allowing for differentiable fingerprint generation.

tools.name: ChemAgent
tools.one_line_profile: LLM-based agent for chemical reasoning and self-updating knowledge
tools.detailed_description: A Large Language Model based agent capable of chemical reasoning and maintaining a self-updating library of chemical knowledge, presented at ICLR 2025.

tools.name: MiniMol
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight pre-trained model for molecular fingerprinting
tools.detailed_description: A 10M-parameter molecular fingerprinting model pre-trained on a large set of biological and quantum tasks, designed to provide efficient and general-purpose molecular embeddings.

tools.name: MolGraphEval
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark framework for molecular graph embeddings
tools.detailed_description: A framework for evaluating self-supervised learning methods for molecular graph embeddings, providing benchmarks and metrics to assess representation quality.

tools.name: DeepEI
tools.one_line_profile: Predicting molecular fingerprints from electron-ionization mass spectra
tools.detailed_description: A deep neural network model designed to predict molecular fingerprints directly from electron-ionization mass spectrometry (EI-MS) data, aiding in structure identification.

tools.name: PyFingerprint
tools.one_line_profile: Library for generating molecular fingerprints
tools.detailed_description: A Python tool for generating various types of molecular fingerprints from chemical structures, facilitating similarity searching and machine learning applications.

tools.name: espsim
tools.one_line_profile: Shape and electrostatic potential similarity scoring tool
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for calculating similarity scores between molecules based on 3D shape and electrostatic potential (ESP), utilizing RDKit for molecular handling.

tools.name: FG-BERT
tools.one_line_profile: Functional group-based BERT for molecular representation
tools.detailed_description: A self-supervised molecular representation learning method that leverages functional groups to improve the embedding quality of BERT-based models for chemical tasks.

tools.name: Graph Neural Networks for Quantum Chemistry
tools.one_line_profile: Implementations of Graph Neural Networks for quantum chemistry tasks
tools.detailed_description: A collection of Graph Neural Network (GNN) implementations specifically tailored for quantum chemistry applications, enabling molecular property prediction and representation learning.

tools.name: pyADA
tools.one_line_profile: Cheminformatics package for Applicability Domain calculation
tools.detailed_description: A Python package designed to perform Applicability Domain analysis of molecular fingerprints based on similarity calculations, useful for validating QSAR models.

tools.name: xyz2mol
tools.one_line_profile: Converter from XYZ coordinates to RDKit molecular objects
tools.detailed_description: A utility tool that converts XYZ atomic coordinate files into RDKit molecule objects with connectivity and bond order inference.

tools.name: ChemRxnExtractor
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for extracting chemical reactions from scientific literature
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning-based toolkit for automatically extracting chemical reaction information, including reactants, products, and conditions, from scientific text.

tools.name: cddd
tools.one_line_profile: Continuous and Data-Driven Descriptors for molecules
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of a translation-based autoencoder to generate continuous and data-driven molecular descriptors (embeddings) from chemical representations.

tools.name: AQME
tools.one_line_profile: Automated Quantum Mechanical Environments workflow tool
tools.detailed_description: A transparent and reproducible workflow tool for automated quantum mechanical calculations, including conformer generation, input creation, and descriptor generation.

tools.name: E3FP
tools.one_line_profile: 3D molecular fingerprint generation library
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for generating 3D molecular fingerprints (E3FP) from molecular conformers, integrating with RDKit for structure handling.

tools.name: Scopy
tools.one_line_profile: Library for negative design in HTS/VS database creation
tools.detailed_description: An integrated Python library for designing high-throughput screening (HTS) and virtual screening (VS) databases, focusing on negative design and filtering undesirable compounds.

tools.name: LPM-24-Dataset
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark dataset for Language + Molecules tasks
tools.detailed_description: A dataset and benchmark repository for evaluating multimodal models on language and molecular tasks, supporting the development of chemical language models.

tools.name: minervachem
tools.one_line_profile: Cheminformatics and machine learning library from LANL
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for cheminformatics and machine learning applications, developed at Los Alamos National Laboratory.

tools.name: scikit-chem
tools.one_line_profile: High-level cheminformatics package built on RDKit
tools.detailed_description: A Python package providing a high-level interface for cheminformatics tasks, built upon RDKit and integrating with the scientific Python stack.

tools.name: PIDGINv3
tools.one_line_profile: Protein target prediction using random forests
tools.detailed_description: A tool for predicting protein targets for chemical compounds using random forest models and reliability-density neighbourhood analysis.

tools.name: torch-molecule
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning package for molecular discovery
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning library designed for molecular discovery, offering an sklearn-style interface for property prediction, inverse design, and representation learning.

tools.name: eMolFrag
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular fragmentation tool based on BRICS
tools.detailed_description: A Python-based tool for molecular fragmentation implementing the BRICS algorithm, useful for fragment-based drug design.

tools.name: LanczosNetwork
tools.one_line_profile: Graph Neural Network based on Lanczos algorithm
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of Lanczos Network, a deep graph convolutional network architecture for learning on graph-structured data, benchmarked on quantum chemistry datasets.

tools.name: PoseBusters
tools.one_line_profile: Plausibility checks for generated molecule poses
tools.detailed_description: A tool for performing physics-based and geometric plausibility checks on generated molecular poses, ensuring chemical validity in docking or generative models.

tools.name: molecularGNN_smiles
tools.one_line_profile: GNN for molecules based on subgraph fingerprints
tools.detailed_description: A Graph Neural Network implementation for molecular property prediction that learns representations based on r-radius subgraphs (fingerprints).

tools.name: molecular_rectifier
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to correct unsanitizable RDKit molecules
tools.detailed_description: A Python utility that attempts to automatically correct and sanitize RDKit molecule objects that fail standard sanitization checks.

tools.name: rdkit_to_params
tools.one_line_profile: Rosetta params file generator from RDKit molecules
tools.detailed_description: A tool to create or modify Rosetta parameter (topology) files from RDKit molecule objects, facilitating interoperability between cheminformatics and protein modeling tools.

tools.name: keras-molecules
tools.one_line_profile: Autoencoder for continuous molecular representation
tools.detailed_description: An autoencoder network implementation for learning continuous vector representations of molecular structures, enabling generative chemistry tasks.

tools.name: ChemDataExtractor
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for extracting chemical information from documents
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit for automatically extracting chemical names, properties, and spectra from scientific documents using NLP techniques.

tools.name: MolVS
tools.one_line_profile: Molecule validation and standardization library
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for validating, standardizing, and salt stripping of chemical structures, ensuring data consistency for cheminformatics workflows.

tools.name: S4 for De Novo Drug Design
tools.one_line_profile: Chemical language modeling with structured state space sequence models
tools.detailed_description: A codebase applying Structured State Space Sequence (S4) models to chemical language modeling for de novo drug design and molecular generation tasks.

tools.name: mordred
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular descriptor calculator
tools.detailed_description: A python-based molecular descriptor calculator capable of calculating over 1800 2D and 3D descriptors, designed for ease of use and performance in cheminformatics.

tools.name: MolecularTransformerEmbeddings
tools.one_line_profile: Transformer for molecular text representation and embeddings
tools.detailed_description: A Transformer neural network model trained to translate between different molecular text representations (SMILES, InChI) and generate continuous molecular embeddings for downstream tasks.

tools.name: ODDT
tools.one_line_profile: Open Drug Discovery Toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A modular and comprehensive toolkit for drug discovery, providing implementations of interaction fingerprints, scoring functions, and methods for virtual screening and QSAR.

tools.name: osmordred
tools.one_line_profile: C++ port of the Mordred descriptor calculator
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance C++ implementation of the Mordred molecular descriptor calculator, designed to accelerate feature engineering workflows.

tools.name: PyPLIF-HIPPOS
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular interaction fingerprinting tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for generating protein-ligand interaction fingerprints (PLIF) from docking results of AutoDock Vina and PLANTS, facilitating post-docking analysis.

tools.name: RDKit
tools.one_line_profile: Open source cheminformatics and machine learning software
tools.detailed_description: The industry-standard open-source cheminformatics library providing extensive functionality for molecule manipulation, descriptor calculation, fingerprint generation, and substructure searching.

tools.name: RDKit.js
tools.one_line_profile: JavaScript distribution of RDKit
tools.detailed_description: A JavaScript library that exposes RDKit's cheminformatics functionality for web-based applications, enabling client-side molecular rendering and processing.

tools.name: MHFP
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular MinHash Fingerprints
tools.detailed_description: An implementation of MHFP6 (MinHash Fingerprint), a molecular fingerprint designed for scalable and accurate similarity search and machine learning applications.

tools.name: chemicalite
tools.one_line_profile: SQLite extension for cheminformatics
tools.detailed_description: A SQLite extension that adds cheminformatics capabilities to SQLite databases, allowing storage, indexing, and querying of chemical structures directly within the database.

tools.name: rxn-standardization
tools.one_line_profile: Chemical compound standardization tool
tools.detailed_description: A tool for standardizing chemical compounds using language models and data-driven approaches, developed by IBM Research for the RXN ecosystem.

tools.name: Mol2vec
tools.one_line_profile: Vector representations of molecular substructures
tools.detailed_description: An unsupervised machine learning library to learn vector representations of molecular substructures (similar to Word2Vec), enabling continuous embedding of molecules for ML tasks.

tools.name: scikit-fingerprints
tools.one_line_profile: Scikit-learn compatible molecular fingerprints
tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive Python library providing a wide range of molecular fingerprints and descriptors, designed to be fully compatible with the scikit-learn ecosystem.

tools.name: poeclm
tools.one_line_profile: Implementation of Product-of-Experts Chemical Language Models for molecular generation
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of Product-of-Experts Chemical Language Models (PoE-CLM) designed to improve molecular generation and representation by combining multiple expert models.

tools.name: ReLM
tools.one_line_profile: Language model-based framework for chemical reaction prediction
tools.detailed_description: ReLM leverages pre-trained language models to enhance chemical reaction prediction, specifically focusing on predicting reaction products and reagents.

tools.name: GROVER
tools.one_line_profile: Self-supervised graph transformer for molecular representation learning
tools.detailed_description: GROVER (Graph Representation from self-supervised message passing transfOrmer) is a state-of-the-art framework for learning molecular embeddings from large-scale unlabelled molecular data using graph transformers.

tools.name: DES-Melting-Point-Predictor
tools.one_line_profile: Prediction of melting point and density for Deep Eutectic Solvents using ChemBERTa
tools.detailed_description: A machine learning tool that utilizes ChemBERTa embeddings and ensemble learning to predict the density and melting point of deep eutectic solvents (DESs).

tools.name: pharmacophore-toolkit
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for generating pharmacophore models from molecular structures
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit built on RDKit to generate simple pharmacophore models, aiding in the identification of essential features for molecular recognition.

tools.name: pinky
tools.one_line_profile: Library for generating molecular fingerprints
tools.detailed_description: A Python library designed for calculating various molecular fingerprints, facilitating chemical similarity search and machine learning applications.

tools.name: MolCAP
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular representation learning enhanced by chemical reactivity pretraining
tools.detailed_description: MolCAP is a molecular representation learning framework that incorporates chemical reactivity knowledge through pretraining and prompted finetuning.

tools.name: molplotly
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive molecular visualization add-on for Plotly
tools.detailed_description: A Python library that extends Plotly to enable interactive visualization of chemical data, allowing users to view molecular structures on mouseover in scatter plots.

tools.name: DeepCombDTI
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning model for drug-target interaction prediction
tools.detailed_description: DeepCombDTI utilizes deep learning and various molecular fingerprints to predict interactions between drugs and target proteins.

tools.name: gmvae
tools.one_line_profile: Gaussian Mixture VAE for interpretable molecular embeddings
tools.detailed_description: A repository implementing Gaussian Mixture Variational Autoencoders (GMVAE) to generate interpretable embeddings from molecular simulation data.

tools.name: MoleRec
tools.one_line_profile: Substructure-aware molecular representation learning for drug recommendation
tools.detailed_description: MoleRec is a framework for combinatorial drug recommendation that employs substructure-aware molecular representation learning to capture fine-grained chemical features.

tools.name: deepFPlearn
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning for linking molecular structures to targets via fingerprints
tools.detailed_description: A tool to link molecular structures (represented as topological fingerprints) to multiple biological targets using deep learning.

tools.name: Atomas
tools.one_line_profile: Hierarchical molecular representation learning from SMILES and text
tools.detailed_description: Atomas is a framework for joint molecular representation learning that aligns SMILES strings and textual descriptions at multiple semantic levels using a hierarchical adaptive alignment model.

tools.name: MolAE
tools.one_line_profile: Auto-encoder based molecular representation learning with 3D cloze test
tools.detailed_description: MolAE implements an auto-encoder framework for molecular representation learning, utilizing a 3D cloze test objective to capture spatial structural information.

tools.name: MolMCL
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-channel learning for context-dependent molecular representation
tools.detailed_description: MolMCL integrates structural hierarchies into context-dependent molecular representations using a multi-channel learning approach.

tools.name: TrimNet
tools.one_line_profile: Molecular representation learning from triplet messages
tools.detailed_description: TrimNet is a deep learning model designed to learn molecular representations by utilizing triplet messages to capture local and global structural information.

tools.name: MolGraph-LarDo
tools.one_line_profile: Integrating LLMs with domain-specific models for molecular graph learning
tools.detailed_description: MolGraph-LarDo combines Large Language Models with domain-specific small models to enhance molecular graph representation learning.

tools.name: DMFGAM
tools.one_line_profile: Predicting hERG channel blockers using fingerprints and graph attention
tools.detailed_description: DMFGAM is a deep learning model that combines molecular fingerprints and graph attention mechanisms to predict hERG channel blockers, crucial for drug safety assessment.

tools.name: GIFDTI
tools.one_line_profile: Drug-target interaction prediction via global interaction representation
tools.detailed_description: GIFDTI predicts drug-target interactions by learning representations of global molecular structures and intermolecular interactions.
